summary: THE DEALER YEARS AGO JUST PUT AN INSERT INTO THE KEY.  NOW THE IGNITION DOES NOT PROPERLY WORK. YOU HAVE TO WIGGLE THE KEY FOR OPERATION. SOMETIMES THE CAR WON'T START,OTHER TIMES THE COMPONENTS WON'T WORK UNLESS I WIGGLE THE KEY. CAR HAS 57,000 MILES.  WAS PART OF THE ORIGINAL RECALL FOR IGNITION PROBLEMS.
